The trail to death.startText: You have died and now are in Heck. You are in line to the judgement desk

1.text: You stay in the line and make it to the desk

2.action: Ask the person in front of you where you are?
2.text: "You are in Heck so stay in line."

1.text: You say "I am (player_name)" the desk person says "Ok your punishment is to get back in line and do this forever."

2.text: A tall devel walks up to you and says you bad
